Yes, there are several options for bike rentals and bike trails in Bridgwater:

1. On Your Bike - a bike rental shop located in the town center. They offer a range of bikes for adults and children, including mountain bikes and electric bikes.

2. Bridgwater and Taunton Canal - a scenic bike trail that runs for 14 miles along the canal from Bridgwater to Taunton. The trail is mostly flat and perfect for leisurely bike rides.

3. Quantock Hills - a popular destination for mountain biking with over 1,200 acres of woodlands and hills. There are several trails of varying difficulty levels, including the challenging Red Trail and the more family-friendly Blue Trail.

4. Bridgwater Way - a cycling and walking route that connects Bridgwater with the neighboring towns of Taunton and Burnham-on-Sea. The route is mostly flat and runs along quiet country lanes and off-road paths.

5. West Country Cycle Hire - a bike rental service that offers delivery and collection of bikes to locations around Bridgwater and the surrounding area. They have a range of bikes for adults and children, including electric bikes and tandems.
